title: Goa government takes major steps towards transparency in recruitment exams
story_summary: The Goa government is enhancing transparency in recruitment exams through the Goa Staff Selection Commission (GSSC).  The GSSC uses computer-based tests with immediate results, eliminating opportunities for manipulation. The commission, an autonomous body, handles recruitment for Group C employees online. A recent exam saw 85% attendance out of 22,045 candidates.  The GSSC employs post-specific, scientific tests that assess language, reasoning, and subject knowledge, including a mandatory Konkani test.  The question papers are generated minutes before the exam from a screened question bank and candidates can view their scores immediately after submission.

title: NEET MDS 2025 registration ends today, apply at natboard.edu.in
story_summary: The National Board of Examinations in Medical Sciences (NBEMS) closes NEET MDS 2025 registration today, April 6, at natboard.edu.in. The application deadline was extended due to the internship completion deadline being moved to June 30, 2025.  The exam date is still April 19, with admit cards to be issued on April 15. NEET MDS 2025 is a computer-based exam with 240 multiple-choice questions in English.  The examination fee is ₹3,500 for General, OBC, and EWS candidates and ₹2,500 for SC, ST, and PWD candidates.

title: AP ECET 2025 registration without late fee ends tomorrow, direct link here
story_summary: APSCHE will close AP ECET 2025 registration without a late fee on April 7, 2025. The application portal is available at cets.apsche.ap.gov.in. Application fees are ₹600 for unreserved, ₹550 for BC, and ₹500 for SC/ST candidates.  AP ECET 2025 exam is scheduled for May 6, 2025, with a preliminary answer key on May 8. Objections can be raised until May 10, 2025.

title: Karnataka PUC 2 Result 2025 News Live: Steps to check KSEAB 2nd PUC results
story_summary: This article provides live updates and steps to check the Karnataka School Examination and Assessment Board (KSEAB) 2nd PUC (Class 12) results for 2025. It includes the official websites where results will be available: karresults.nic.in and kseab.karnataka.gov.in.  No specific result date is mentioned in this article.

title: Rajasthan PTET 2025 registration ends tomorrow, direct link here
story_summary: The registration window for Rajasthan PTET 2025, for B.Ed and B.A B.Ed/B.Sc B.Ed courses, closes tomorrow.  Interested candidates can apply on the official website ptetvmoukota2025.in. The application fee is ₹500.  The Pre-Teacher Education Test is scheduled for June 15, 2025.

title: KCET admit card 2025 released at cetonline.karnataka.gov.in, how to check
story_summary: The Karnataka Examinations Authority (KEA) has released the KCET 2025 admit card on cetonline.karnataka.gov.in.  Candidates can download the admit card using their login ID or registration number and password.  KCET 2025 will be held on April 15, 16, and 17, 2025, in two shifts.

title: MHT CET 2025 for PCM stream from April 19, website to check admit card when out
story_summary: The Maharashtra CET Cell will conduct the MHT CET 2025 for the PCM group from April 19 onwards.  Admit cards for PCM will be released soon on cetcell.mahacet.org. The PCB group exams are from April 9 to April 17.  The exam will be conducted in two shifts daily and has no negative marking.

title: AP Inter Results 2025 News: Check BIEAP result dates for last 5 years
story_summary: BIEAP will announce AP Inter results for 2025 on its official websites; date is not yet confirmed. Past result dates indicate announcements in April but are not indicative of this year's date.  IPE exams were conducted in March 2025 and students need 35% to pass each subject. Official websites for checking results are bieap.gov.in and resultsbie.ap.gov.in.

title: RRB ALP CBT 2 revised schedule announced, know which candidates need to appear
story_summary: Railway Recruitment Boards (RRBs) has announced a revised schedule for the Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) CBT 2.  The exam is rescheduled for May 2 and 6. The exam city intimation slip will be available 10 days before the exam. Admit cards will be available four days prior.  The RRB ALP CBT 2 will consist of two parts totaling 175 questions and a negative marking of 1/3rd for each wrong answer.

title: RSSB Prahari Admit Card 2024 release date announced at rssb.rajasthan.gov.in
story_summary: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board has announced the RSSB Prahari Admit Card 2024 release date as April 8, 2025.  The admit card will be available on recruitment.rajasthan.gov.in through their SSO ID.  The written examination for Prahari post will be held on April 12, 2025, in two shifts. Candidates must carry their e-admit card, an original photo ID, and Aadhar card to the exam center.

title: Goa SSC Result 2025 Date, time: GBSHSE Class 10 results releasing on April 7
story_summary: Goa Board of Secondary and Higher Secondary Education (GBSHSE) will announce the Class 10 results on April 7, 2025, at 5 pm.  Results can be checked on gbshse.in and results.gbshsegoa.net.  The consolidated result sheet will be available for download from April 9, 2025. Mark sheets can be collected by an authorized representative of the school.

title: Mental Health Courses offered by IGNOU, TISS, NIMHANS and others, list here
story_summary: The article lists mental health courses offered by government institutes like IGNOU, TISS, and NIMHANS.  Courses range from diplomas to certificate programs, covering topics like emotional intelligence, stress management, rehabilitation, and cognitive behavioral therapy.  The courses aim to create awareness and provide skills for mental health professionals and interested individuals.

title: SBI PO prelims result 2025 declared at sbi.co.in, here’s how to check marks
story_summary: SBI has declared the Probationary Officer (PO) Preliminary Examination results held in March 2025. Candidates can check their results on sbi.co.in.  Qualified candidates are eligible for the SBI PO Main Examination, with call letters expected soon. The recruitment process involves online tests, group exercises, and personal interviews.

title: Karnataka 2nd PUC Result 2025: List of official websites to check PUC 2 results
story_summary: KSEAB has not yet confirmed the 2nd PUC exam 1 result date and time. Results will be available on karresults.nic.in and kseab.karnataka.gov.in when declared. The 2nd PUC exam 1 was conducted from March 1 to March 20.

title: JKSSB JE recruitment 2025: Registration for 292 posts ends on April 7
story_summary: JKSSB JE recruitment 2025 registration for 292 Junior Engineer posts ends on April 7, 2025.  Interested candidates can apply through jkssb.nic.in.  The selection process comprises a written exam with objective-type, multiple-choice questions with negative marking.

title: SECR Apprentice Recruitment 2025: Apply for 1007 posts, check details here
story_summary: South East Central Railway (SECR) has announced apprentice recruitment for 1007 posts. Eligible candidates can apply through apprenticeshipindia.gov.in from April 5 to May 4, 2025. Applicants should have passed matriculation with 50% marks. The age limit is 15 to 24 years. Selection will be based on a merit list.

title: Karnataka SSLC Answer Key 2025 out at kseab.karnataka.gov.in, download link here
story_summary: KSEAB has released the Karnataka SSLC Answer Key 2025 on kseab.karnataka.gov.in.  The provisional answer key for SSLC exam 1 was released on April 4, and the objection window is open until 5.30 pm on April 6, 2025. Candidates can raise objections through the official website. The Karnataka SSLC examination took place from March 21 to April 4, 2025.

title: SBI PO Prelims Result 2025 declared at sbi.co.in, direct link to check here
story_summary: State Bank of India has declared the SBI PO Prelims Result 2025, available on sbi.co.in. The preliminary examination took place on March 8, 16, 24, and 26, 2025.  The exam consisted of objective-type questions for 100 marks, with negative marking. The recruitment drive aims to fill 600 Probationary Officer posts.

title: Juggling to achieve Work-Life Balance? Harvard shares 5 steps to achieve it
story_summary: Harvard University shares five steps to achieve work-life balance. They include pausing to analyze your work patterns, understanding your emotions, reprioritizing tasks, considering alternative solutions, and implementing changes. It emphasizes rational understanding and emotional reflexivity.  Priorities change over time; focus on alignment and acknowledge priorities.

title: Leisha Agarwal, Avila Lyngdoh top MBOSE SSLC 2025 exams with 582 marks each
story_summary: Leisha Agarwal and Avila Kathrene P Lyngdoh jointly topped the Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBOSE) SSLC 2025 exams with 582 marks. Meghalaya recorded a significant improvement with an 87.10% pass percentage, a dramatic rise from 55.80% last year.  This year's merit list included students from both urban and rural schools, with several sharing positions and saw a rise in schools with 100% pass rates.

title: Meghalaya MBOSE SSLC Result: Shillong, Jowai students top Class 10 exam
story_summary: Leisha Agarwal from Shillong and Avila Kathrene P Lyngdoh from Jowai topped the MBOSE SSLC 2025 exam, with 582 marks. This year, the board achieved a pass percentage of 87.10 per cent, the best since 2021.  Meghalaya Chief Minister congratulated successful students and said the result is path-breaking. The SSLC Supplementary examination will be held within April-May, 2025.

title: How can financial literacy be taught & why it is important after class 12
story_summary: Financial literacy is crucial for students post-Class 12 to manage finances, avoid debt, and make informed investment decisions. It helps with budgeting, understanding loans, and managing bank accounts. Resources include self-learning, online courses, workshops, and parental guidance. Financial education should be incorporated into school and university curriculums.

title: IDBI Bank SCO Recruitment 2025: Notification out for 119 posts, details here
story_summary: IDBI Bank has announced SCO Recruitment 2025 for 119 Specialist Cadre Officer posts.  Registration begins on April 7 and closes on April 20, 2025, through idbibank.in.  The selection process includes preliminary screening, group discussion, and/or personal interview. The application fee is ₹1050 for General, EWS, and OBC and ₹250 for SC/ST.
